amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: Sec.___. Each amount made available by this Act is hereby reduced by 1 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 12 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding in the bill by 1 percent across-the-board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A056) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 248 (Roll no. 210).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A056) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
